title: $1000.00 off 1st month rent on select 1 bedroom apartments
map_address: 1350 Oak View Circle near Rohnert Park Expressway
app_fee: $52 Application Fee (waived if apply within 72 hrs of 1st tour)
posting_body: Where the art of living well is gracefully defined
Oak View of Sonoma Hills Apartments
1350 Oak View Cir Rohnert Park, CA 94928
This one-bedroom, one-bathroom model at Oak View of Sonoma Hills elevates your senior lifestyle in Rohnert Park.
Together with a patio or deck attached to the living room, the layout comes complete with a breakfast bar in the kitchen and a walk-in closet in the bedroom.
For added convenience, a coat closet and a built-in desk are included as well.
In this pet-friendly community, mingle with neighbors in the billiards room over pool matches, at the full-service salon while getting a facial, or in the heated pool during a water aerobics class.
Call or email today for additional details.
OAK VIEW OF SONOMA APARTMENTS OPERATES AS A 55+ SENIOR COMMUNITY.
Full Month Rent + $99 Deposit & Waived Application Fees / Oak View is a 55+ Community / Valid on Select Homes / Restrictions Apply
* “Universal Design” features in kitchens and bathrooms promoting easy usage
* Indoor Game Rooms in each building
* Full Service Salon on site includes facials & Massage
* Tai Chi, strength and balance and water aerobics classes
$40 for covered parking and $30 for uncovered reserved.
Please call our leasing office for complete parking information.
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $300 pet deposit per pet.
Pet rent is $20 per month for 1 pet and $30 per month for 2 pets.
There is a weight limit of 30 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
